p: A particular application of nanotechnology-derived unconventional formulations consists of optimizing the surface of commonly used medical devices with nanostructured and bioactive coatings, intending to potentiate or induce anti-infective properties [ 60, 61, 62]. The development of antimicrobial and anti-biofilm coatings that combat drug-resistant microorganisms and reduce or eliminate related infections is of great interest for the healthcare system.
